long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
roPass.com is a simple site for securely sharing randomly generated passwords. This extension uses the ropass API to generate a random password and corresponding link. The link can then only be viewed one time by the recipient.

No more emailing passwords... Send your end users a link to view their password and don't worry about it sitting in their inbox.

Extension Defaults:

Password Length: 15
Link Expiration: 12 hrs
Special Chars: Yes
